alert.note: Alert for Kane (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Advisory issued July 24 at 6:03PM MDT until July 24 at 11:00PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...FLOOD ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 9 PM MDT THIS EVENING... * WHAT...Localized urban and small stream flooding caused by excessive rainfall continues. * WHERE...Kanab and surrounding areas in Kane County. * WHEN...Until 900 PM MDT. * IMPACTS...Minor flooding in low-lying and poor drainage areas. Ponding of water in urban and other poor drainage areas is occurring or is imminent. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 601 PM MDT, Doppler radar indicated heavy rain due to thunderstorms. This will cause urban and small stream flooding. Overflowing poor drainage areas will cause minor flooding in the advisory area. Between 0.5 and 1 inch of rain has fallen, with 0.65 inch of water measured in Kanab within the past hour. - Additional rainfall amounts of 0.25 to 0.75 inch are expected over the area. This additional rain will result in continued minor flooding. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... Kanab.
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles. Be aware of your surroundings and do not drive on flooded roads.
